snippet: Hospital administrators, doctors and nurses have been charged over $430 million in false claims made to Medicare after an investigation by federal authorities.
abstract: Ninety-one people including doctors, nurses and other medical professionals are charged criminally after an investigation of Medicare fraud involving $430 million in false billing in several cities.
lead_paragraph: Hospital administrators, doctors and nurses have been charged over $430 million in false claims made to Medicare after an investigation by federal authorities.

headline.main: 91 Are Charged With Fraud, Billing Millions to Medicare
headline.print_headline: 91 Are Charged With Fraud, Billing Millions to Medicare
